project.objective:
Realtrack Systems is a company specialising in the development and commercialisation of sports and health-oriented innovative technological solutions whose goal is to improve performance and well-being by monitoring and analyzing various parameters related to participation in sports activities.
The use of technology applied to sports has been a growing trend in the recent years, particularly significant among non-professional athletes who are increasingly interested in using technology to improve their personal performance. These individuals demand products in this line that are adapted to their needs, that is, products with high-tech features that are reasonably priced, easy to use and adapt to any sports discipline.
WIMU Active is the solution developed by Realtrack Systems for this market segment; consists of a small and robust wearable device with associated software, for enhanced data capture and advanced monitoring analysis used in performance improvement of key parameters related to participation in competitive team sports activities, cost effective to specifically fill the elite amateur and sub professional sportsman segment need.
project.title: TECHNOLOGY FOR THE IMPROVEMENT OF SPORTS PERFORMANCE IN NON-PROFESSIONAL CONTEXTS
